One movie that could be recommended based on those preferences is "The Bourne Identity".
This movie follows the story of a man who wakes up in an unfamiliar place with no memory of how he got there.
As he tries to piece together his past, he finds himself embroiled in a web of deceit and betrayal.
As he fights to uncover the truth about his past and save himself from a fate worse than death, he discovers that the only way to truly break free from the chains of one's past is to embrace one's true identity and let go of all the lies and deception that have held you back from living your life to the fullest.
In "The Bourne Identity", we see how far one can go down the path of deceit and betrayal before it's too late to start fresh and let loose all the pent-up tension and stress that have been building up inside you over time, without ever being able to take a moment for yourself to just stop and breathe and let your mind relax and come back to center again, where you can truly begin to live your life to the fullest once again.
